<ce:table colsep="0" frame="topbot" id="t0020" rowsep="0" xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/cals/dtd">
<ce:label>Table 4</ce:label>
<ce:caption id="cn065">
<ce:simple-para id="sp0085" view="all">Summary of magnetic susceptibility properties of the compounds of this study: best fit parameters to the Curie–Weiss law (Eqs. <ce:cross-refs id="r0075" refid="e0005 e0015">(1) and (2)</ce:cross-refs>).</ce:simple-para>
</ce:caption>
<tgroup cols="4">
